p: Peptide prediction algorithms and the ability to synthesize large numbers of peptides has helped us in understanding the T-cell response in a DENV person. Using these techniques, a large number of epitopes for MHC I and MHC II have been mapped. And NS3 seems to be the most immunodominant region of the virus with many CD4 and CD8 epitopes described in humans ( Duangchinda et al., 2010, Kurane et al., 1989).
